alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 11:25PM CDT until August 14 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Southwestern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Fort Leonard Wood, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Leonard Wood, Waynesville, St. Robert, Laquey, Devil`s Elbow, Dry Knob and Falcon. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 145 and 166. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
